item.title: Baltimore's Historical Sightseeing Tour
item.description: Baltimore is a city of diverse neighborhoods but, for visitors, it can be tricky to know which to visit. This small-group guided tour takes the guesswork out of your trip. Your guide will take you to see several different neighborhoods and fill you in on Baltimore's rich history and culture so that you have a fuller understanding of the city.

image.alt: Baltimore's Historical Sightseeing Tour

item.title: Baltimore Walking Foodie Tour in Fells Point
item.description: Discover Chesapeake Bay cuisine and other dishes on a 3.5-hour small-group walking tour of Fells Point, Baltimore's historic waterfront district. Your guide shares commentary on the history and architecture of the city as you walk through the neighborhood. You'll stop for tastings at four restaurants, and sip a signature alcoholic drink at a fifth establishment. The tour features small local businesses that are popular in the area, and includes one drink and enough food samples to make up a meal. Additional drinks are available for purchase.

image.alt: Baltimore Walking Foodie Tour in Fells Point

item.title: Fells Point Food Tour in Baltimore
item.description: Baltimore's Fell's Point neighborhood is filled with great places to eat. But, if you are new in town, it can be difficult to find the best spots. This tour guides you through the historic district, visiting family-run restaurants along the way to sample specially made dishes including Polish, Baltimore-style pit beef, and Spanish tapas.

image.alt: Fells Point Food Tour in Baltimore

item.title: Baltimore Indoor Skydiving Experience with 2 Flights & Personalized Certificate
item.description: Experience the buzz of skydiving by taking part in a Baltimore Indoor Skydiving experience. You won’t have to worry if you’re a first-time skydiver, as an experienced flight instructor will go through specialized training with you. Take the stress out of jumping out of a plane, by going in a vertical wind tunnel instead. You’ll take part in a small-group training session, then enjoy two exhilarating sessions of free-fall flights in the wind tunnel.

image.alt: Baltimore Indoor Skydiving Experience with 2 Flights & Personalized Certificate

item.title: Stretch Limo Private Day & Night Custom Tours of Washington DC
item.description: Enjoy a comfortable, one-of-a-kind way to explore the nation's capital on this private limousine tour. Meet your guide at your preferred Washington DC, Virginia, or Maryland address, and hop aboard your luxury vehicle. In the space of just half a day, you'll see dozens of Washington DC's top landmarks, from the White House and Jefferson Memorial to the Supreme Court, Library of Congress, and much more.

image.alt: Stretch Limo Private Day & Night Custom Tours of Washington DC

item.title: Raven's Revenge Ghost Tour in Baltimore
item.description: Find out all about the haunted side of Baltimore and its dark history on this walking tour of the Fell’s Point neighborhood. Learn about the spirit of Edgar Allen Poe and his mysterious death along the way. You’ll be stopping at several pubs/bars/saloons, the cemetery, and a hotel, where you’ll hear tales of the haunted places from your guide along the way.

image.alt: Raven's Revenge Ghost Tour in Baltimore

item.title: The Original Fells Point Ghost Walk by Baltimore Ghost Tours
item.description: Stroll through Baltimore's Fells Point neighborhood while hearing ghost stories on this spooky tour. With a guide providing eerie tales as you walk, stop at some of the most historic and haunted landmarks in the neighborhood. You'll come away with a deeper understanding of the neighborhood's history and its grisly past, facts you might not otherwise learn on traditional tours.

image.alt: The Original Fells Point Ghost Walk by Baltimore Ghost Tours

item.title: Private and personalized tour of Washington dc
item.description: Tick off the highlights of Washington D.C. during this private, half-day tour. Customize your own itinerary, selecting a range of local sights to visit. Optional stops include the White House, Arlington National Cemetery, Lincoln Memorial, or the National Museum of American History at the Smithsonian. Air-conditioned vehicle transfers with hotel pickup and drop-off are provided.

image.alt: Private and personalized tour of Washington dc

item.title: Glow in the Dark Splatter Paint Experience
item.description: Immerse yourself in a glow-in-the-dark art adventure, where this brings an unforgettable community experience. Unleash creativity in a judgment-free zone, bonding over paint and tunes with loved ones. Dive into unique moments: from mastering abstract techniques to dancing as you splatter paint, every stroke is a step towards a luminous masterpiece. Your experience is customizable, ensuring it resonates with your vibe. What sets this experience apart are the key moments that make it truly unforgettable: -Personalized Music Selection: Engage in the creative process while listening to your favorite tunes, adding a personal soundtrack to your art-making journey. -Protective Gear: goggles, gloves, and hazmat suits, you'll feel like a true art scientist, ready to experiment without worrying about splatters and spills. This playful aspect adds an element of whimsy and carefreeness to the experience. -Interactive Art Techniques: Learn and apply various abstract techniques and create art

image.alt: Glow in the Dark Splatter Paint Experience

item.title: Baltimore Signature Dinner Cruise
item.description: Set sail on the Patapsco River for an unforgettable dinner cruise in Baltimore. Enjoy scenic views of the Inner Harbor and skyline while savoring freshly prepared entrees, salads, and desserts. Dance the night away with live DJ entertainment in this 2.5-hour unforgettable experience.

image.alt: Baltimore Signature Dinner Cruise

item.title: 4- Hour Private customizable Washington DC Tour
item.description: Discover the highlights of Washington D.C. during this four-hour private tour. Follow a customizable itinerary with a seasoned guide and long-time local resident. Understand the history and significance of iconic landmarks like the White House, Supreme Court, Lincoln Memorial, and more—with plenty of get-down photo stops along the way. Enjoy complimentary bottled water and door-to-door transfers from the airport or your DC Metro Area hotel.

image.alt: 4- Hour Private customizable Washington DC Tour

item.title: Baltimore Signature Lunch Cruise
item.description: Take a break from sightseeing to relax on a cruise through Baltimore’s Inner Harbor, with rare views of top historic landmarks from the boat. Your admission ticket includes live entertainment during a full buffet lunch. With guaranteed seating for the number of people in your party and easy access to the dock from downtown, this tour is a popular choice for couples, groups, and locals alike.

image.alt: Baltimore Signature Lunch Cruise

item.title: Little Italy and Jonestown Food Tour
item.description: Satisfy your taste buds on a walking tour of two Baltimore neighborhoods popular among foodies—Little Italy and Jonestown. In addition to navigating for you, your guide brings you to a variety of historic establishments and hidden gems often missed by visitors. With skip–the–line access to stops on the itinerary, guests sample the specialties of early 19th–century Jewish and Italian immigrants, from fresh knishes to homemade meatballs.

image.alt: Little Italy and Jonestown Food Tour

item.title: Luxury Catamaran Private Tour Baltimore Harbor
item.description: Climb aboard our remarkable 38ft Luxury Sailing Catamaran docked at the iconic Lighthouse Point Resort & Marina. The Lady Tiffany has all the accommodations and more to host your next exclusive waterfront tour of the Inner Harbor and surrounding waters of the Chesapeake Bay! Hosting 4 bedrooms, Saloon, open Cockpit, Spacious forward seating area with trampolines that connect you ever so close to the marine environment! This vessel is equipped with an upgraded premium 12 speaker audio system with bluetooth connectivity. 2 Spacious bathrooms aboard A Full Kitchen with a microwave, double sink, fridge, and freezers. This Luxury Sailing Yacht is an amazing platform to host events and more!

image.alt: Luxury Catamaran Private Tour Baltimore Harbor

item.title: Baltimore's Cruise ship Tour-shuttle service
item.description: If you're finishing up a cruise or waiting for a flight, this small-group tour of Baltimore allows you to make the most of your time in Charm City. As you visit local landmarks such as Camden Yards, home of the Orioles, and the first Roman Catholic cathedral in America, you'll see the diversity of Baltimore's neighborhoods and learn all about the history and culture of the city.

image.alt: Baltimore's Cruise ship Tour-shuttle service

item.title: Original Fells Point Haunted Pub Tour by Baltimore Ghost Tours
item.description: Step through the doors of some of Fell’s Point’s most haunted pubs for a fascinating haunted pub crawl tour of this historic maritime neighborhood. Taverns in Fells Point have always been the rowdy stomping grounds of locals and visitors alike looking for a good time and a drink, and today it’s no different. Join the crowd and belly up to the bar like times past. Each haunted pub tour is unique with our tour guides providing their favorite haunted tales from our book, Baltimore's Harbor Haunts: True Ghost Stories, combined with their own personal ghostly experiences over the years. All of our tour guides have worked for us for at least five years, with the most seasoned guides having over 20 years of experience with us, and 20 years of ghostly tales to regale the group. The Fells Point Haunted Pub Tour is for ages 21 and older only, and is a public group tour. You will visit 3-4 haunted pubs during the tour with a tour length of 2-2.5 hours, depending on the tour guide.

image.alt: Original Fells Point Haunted Pub Tour by Baltimore Ghost Tours

item.title: Baltimore Boos & Booze Haunted Pub Crawl
item.description:
Join us for a Baltimore Haunted Pub Crawl and add some fun to your work week or vacation! Explore several local watering holes and haunted hotspots on this unique, exciting tour.
This tour will take you to several pubs in Baltimore, which may be a combination of craft producers and local bars. There will be a variety of haunted stops in between these already notorious bars and pubs, so by the end of the tour, you'll be a ghost expert!
Grab your first drink at Max's Taphouse as your guide begins your haunting and historic journey through downtown Baltimore. From there, you'll have the chance to enjoy drinks at 3 other popular pubs and explore some other haunted locations in between. Hear stories of the Fell Family Cemetery while standing on haunted ground. Step back in time and hear the dark history behind the Waterfront Hotel. Enjoy your last drink at the Cat's Eye Pub before going home to tell your friends all about what you learned, saw, drank, and maybe even felt!

image.alt: Baltimore Boos & Booze Haunted Pub Crawl

item.title: Airport Transfer BWI Airport to Baltimore Downtown Area Only
item.description: Treat yourself to an easy journey from Baltimore Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport to downtown Baltimore with this private transfer service. Your driver will meet you at the baggage claim of the international arrivals gates for a hassle-free travel experience. You can simply relax and enjoy the ride to your downtown destination in a comfortable sedan or SUV.

image.alt: Airport Transfer BWI Airport to Baltimore Downtown Area Only

item.title: private Ronald Reagan, Washington National Airport transfer
item.description: This is a personalized private airport transport service. We will pick you up in front of the terminal without any additional stops and take you to your hotel. Additionally, we track your flight information to remain updated on any airline delays.

image.alt: private Ronald Reagan, Washington National Airport transfer

item.title: Hard Rock Cafe Baltimore
item.description: Rock out on your visit to Baltimore with a meal at Hard Rock Café, where you can feast on classic American fare from a prix-fixe menu. Meals are themed and each option comes with a drink (tea, coffee, or soda), as well as a tasty dessert. For your main course, choose from classics like grilled salmon, steak fajitas, or a signature burger.

image.alt: Hard Rock Cafe Baltimore

item.title: Baltimore's Private Cultural Tour
item.description: Our Baltimore Cultural tour allow you to get a personal perspective of why Baltimore is called "Charm City".

image.alt: Baltimore's Private Cultural Tour

item.title: Baltimore Monuments Walking Tour
item.description: Our Baltimore Monument Tour will begin in the lobby of Baltimore visitors center with the Visionary of our Baltimore Inner Harbor attraction area and end with a powerful Statue Pope John II .

image.alt: Baltimore Monuments Walking Tour

item.title: Self-Guided Scavenger Hunt: Baltimore Inner Harbor & Outer Sights
item.description: Skip the standard sightseeing tour and shake up your vacation with a more exciting and interactive activity. Download the scavenger hunt app and start exploring downtown Baltimore at your own pace with just your group. Learn interesting trivia as you tackle challenges, race against the clock and put your navigation skills to the test.

image.alt: Self-Guided Scavenger Hunt: Baltimore Inner Harbor & Outer Sights

item.title: Historical Baltimore Self-Driving Sightseeing Audio Tour
item.description: Cruise Baltimore and learn all about its rich history from the comfort of your own car with this self-guided audio driving tour. This app-based tour works with your smartphone to send you on a sightseeing route, aided by a live GPS map. Drive past sites like the USS Constellation, Fells Point, and Baltimore City Hall while listening to riveting tales of Baltimoreans such as Frederick Douglass and Edgar Allen Poe.

image.alt: Historical Baltimore Self-Driving Sightseeing Audio Tour
